name: Xtreme Drift 2
description:
The extreme drift racing experience in the most realistic drifting game around.

Main Features:

- Drift in City
- 10 different tracks
- With 4 different mode (Drift , Race , Freestyle,Online)
- Realistic physics, simulating every aspect of car behavior
- Drive more than 30 powerful and exciting, highly detailed drift cars
- Customize your cars with exclusive paint jobs and rims
- 40 Realistic engine sounds
- Turbocharger, gearbox and tires sounds
- Realistic 3D graphics
- Drift slow motion
